      • login

        public void login(java.lang.String email,
                  java.lang.String password,
                  LoginCallback loginCallback)
        Login user using Email and Password which return UserInfo and it will start the Session
        Parameters:
        email - User's Registered Mail id
        password - User's Registered Password
        loginCallback - Interface for onSuccess() & onError()

      • callBackMethod

        public void callBackMethod(ResponseData data,
                           java.lang.String password,
                           LoginCallback loginCallback)
        From Here we will fetch token for further usage with Callback Url from Login api.
        Parameters:
        data - Product Response data
        password - User Password
        loginCallback -

      • fetchTokenApi

        public void fetchTokenApi(java.lang.Boolean renewToken,
                          java.lang.String password,
                          CommonListener listener)
        Mainly used to get the AccessToken and to Refresh the Token upon Session Expiry. It fetches the AccessToken, RefreshToken, UserInfo, Permissions, Filters and much more into the local SharedPreference
        Parameters:
        renewToken - Used as a Flag Variable to differentiate between Fetching new AccessToken or Renewing old AccessToken
        password - User Password
        listener - Interface for onSuccess and onFailure

      • forgotPassword

        public void forgotPassword(java.lang.String emailId,
                           AuthResponseInterface listener)
        Used to change Password Function call will happen from Product side
        Parameters:
        emailId - User Mail Id
        listener -

                           java.lang.String newPassword,
                           java.lang.String confirmPassword,
                           AuthResponseInterface listener)
        Used to Change Password Function Call will Happen on Product side
        Parameters:
        oldPassword - User Old Password
        newPassword - User New Password (length >8)
        confirmPassword - User New Password
        listener -

      • getCallBackUrlOTPEnabledState

        public void getCallBackUrlOTPEnabledState(android.content.Context context,
                                          LoginCallback callback)
        This method is used to get the CallBackUrl for the corresponding product. From this CallBackUrl we will use only the RedirectCode to fetch the user details. This method will once user is allowed for OTP Verification, for getting new AccessToken and also once AccessToken Is Expired. Note: While documenting this OTP feature is not enabled.
        Parameters:
        context -
        callback - Interface for onSuccess and onError

      • renewTokenApi

        public void renewTokenApi(android.content.Context context,
                          LoginCallback callback)
        If user token expired then this particular method call again login api and fetch api to get token.
        Parameters:
        context -
        callback -
